channel.title: Ok i have a huge question
channel.description:
Ok so i wasnt sure what forum this should be in but i thought this would be the most relevant forum :P
ok to my point. I'm starting up a new server ( not gna say the name ) and well im a basic java coder and well i need someone to do the client side of the server. i have tried but well it's too complicated for me i dont know how to add models etc.
so is anyone up for the challenge? btw i dont have a hoster yet so if you can also help with that if not i may have someone to host.
ok so heres a list of realy what i need:
1. Be able to add items + specials 2. a good knowledge of clients and some other stuff i cannot think off
there is one other person helping with the server but a the moment he is busy and like me he cannot code client :P lol
cheers
i make this relevant by saying "im askin for help with my client :P"[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 14, 2008, 01:07:15 pm[/size][hr]bump :S

item.title: Ok i have a huge question
item.dc:creator: @gamma gamma
item.description:
@gamma wrote:

first of all if everyone else can make their own clients then why dont you??

noone wants to waste their time on a client for someone else…

just go to downloads section and download galkons client… and then search a tut on how to edit it…

why would someone make a client for someone else when they could be working on one for themselves??

Read full topic
item.source: Ok i have a huge question
